meanings: wish, hope, want, (formal) desire, (간절히) long for, (기대하다) look forward to

meanings.meaning: with a view to something/to doing something
be/make so bold (as to do something)

vlive.korean: [또르르... 다음엔 인생템이 단종되는 일 없길 바라며...] [Crying... I hope you don't get discontinued in your next life...] View video SSONGYANG : 단돈 4,000원대면 OK! 브러쉬 세척 꿀팁과 꿀템 소개!! | 먼지쌓인 브러쉬 있는 사람🖐🏻
vlive.english: [Crying... I hope you don't get discontinued in your next life...]

vlive.korean: 네 이렇게 하트가 쓩~ 전달되기 바라며. We hope that our hearts are deliverd to you. 듣기 View video 위에화엔터테인먼트(YUEHUA Entertainment) : [♥ Mission] 형섭X의웅 하트를 부르는 애교 ㅠㅠ
vlive.english: We hope that our hearts are deliverd to you.

vlive.korean: [우리 앙즈들 간식 CF을 바라며 곰돌이 친구 CF] 어딜 보고 하면 될까요? [They want to shoot Haribo commercials] Where should I stare? 듣기 View video Dispatch : [ⓓxV] “앙즈, TRICK OR TREAT!” 할로윈 간식 먹방 ③ (아이즈원)
vlive.english: [They want to shoot Haribo commercials] Where should I stare?

vlive.korean: [주방에서의 좋은 기억만 가져가길 바라며] 그리고 주방에서 있었던 기억을... [Keep only good memories from the kitchen] Remember this kitchen. 듣기 View video 동방신기의 72시간 - my SMTelevision : [동방신기의 72시간] EP 28. 특별했던 72시간
vlive.english: [Keep only good memories from the kitchen] Remember this kitchen.

vlive.korean: 그날을 바라며! Hoping for the day! 듣기 View video GFRIEND : 여자친구가 사랑한 유럽 EP.08 END Part.1

examples.korean: He took his chances and jumped into the water. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그는 요행을 바라며 물속으로 뛰어 들었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: He took his chances and jumped into the water. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: I hope this clears up what I said, and I apologize for causing the confusion. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 이것으로 제가 말씀 드린 내용이 정리되길 바라며, 이런 혼동을 초래하게 되어 죄송합니다. DARAKWON
examples.english: I hope this clears up what I said, and I apologize for causing the confusion. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: Please accept our apologies for the inconvenience you have experienced and rest assured that we are seriously looking into the matter. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 귀하께 끼쳐 드린 불편함에 대한 저희의 사과를 받아주시기 바라며, 저희가 이 문제를 진지하게 조사하고 있으니 안심하셔도 됩니다. DARAKWON
examples.english: Please accept our apologies for the inconvenience you have experienced and rest assured that we are seriously looking into the matter. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: We hope you enjoy your flight with us, and we thank you for choosing Air Jet Express. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 즐거운 비행이 되시길 바라며, Air Jet Express을 이용해 주셔서 감사합니다. YBM All in All English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: We hope you enjoy your flight with us, and we thank you for choosing Air Jet Express. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: Hrothgar's warriors travel to the swamp with the hopes of taking revenge on Grendal's mother. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 왕의 전사들은 그렌델의 어미에 대해 복수할 수 있길 바라며 늪지로 여행한다. Neungyule
examples.english: Hrothgar's warriors travel to the swamp with the hopes of taking revenge on Grendal's mother. Add to Wordbook
